ADC_CTRL

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x8
Size:
0x2
Source:
registers.rdl

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[15:6] - - - -
[5:2] MAIN_STATE_RB r 0x0 -
[1] SYNC_RESET_RB r 0x0 -
[0] START_CONVERSION rw 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

MAIN_STATE_RB

Readback of the current status of the main state machine.

SYNC_RESET_RB

Readback of the internal synchronous reset.

START_CONVERSION

When a 1 is written, starts an NFFT conversion. When read, a 1 means the NFFT conversion is running, and a 0 means it is not. If a 0 is written while the conversion is running, terminates the conversion early and sets state machine back to ready state.
